title: Why don't people itemize for the enemy in the midlane?
body:
Most matchups I see people buying the regular stage of items.
For example with mages, they usually always go -> morellnomicon or some damage item, even when they're so far behind.
I.E Syndra Vs Fizz, Syndra goes 0/6 vs Fizz, bought no boots and goes for Abyssal, yes abysall has some MR, reduces their MR as well.
But if you go 0/6, that's not going to help vs a Fizz, you're not going to survive his burst, get mobile and get a Zhonyas Hourglass.
